I love these tops. Very comfortable and you don’t need a bra.  I wear large. I am in 36DD bust and 10/12 in pants. I have a very long waist and torso so if you are short waisted it will pair well with leggings. It is difficult for me to find longer tops. I get compliments every time I wear them. I am also longer in the shoulders and when I first put this on, it fits a little short in the bra portion where the elastic sits under the bust but it then stretches to be very comfortable. Highly recommend!

评论概述: Really good hold for Big Boobs
评论详情: I ordered this tank  about a year ago in 2023.  I just ordered 5 more. I am a 44 DDD and they are my favorite tanks to put on and do yard or house work. They are also great for a quick run to the grocery store. It’s really hard to find good shelf bra tank tops that offer enough support without squeezing everything too tight. The solid color tanks are cut more generously than the printed and I ended up donating the printed tanks that I ordered in XXL . I only reordered solid colors in XXL.
This shelf bra tank top is the most supportive I have ever worn.  Just ordered 1 to check it out.  Went online and ordered another color at the end of the day.
Runs small, returned through Staples but Amazon never didnt credit.
I ordered in two more colors as the length is longer and covers my behind more than others.

评论概述: Good fit, but I still need an actual sports bra
评论详情: This shirt is very comfortable and perfect for hot weather, but if you are large chested like me, you will still need a sports bra if you're working out or doing something that will make the girls move a lot.  If I'm just walking the dog, I can easily get away without the sports bra though.  It washes and dries great!
Larger than expected but thought it would work. Hot yoga one time and hate it. Can’t return now. Not supportive if that’s what you’re after and not tech wicking. Uggh.
This fits me as I expected. The material is nice and comfortable.  The built in sports bra is very nice. I will order more of these and I recommend them to you too!

The pattern of this top is super cute but the fit is way off. Like most of these built in bra tops, they really don’t hold the girls if your girls are on the larger side. I ordered an XL because the sizing chart said that should fit my measurements. It was way too large.
The material is comfortable and I like the length. I did accidentally get a size too small but it would have fit great if it was the right size. The color is nice and will launder well.

评论概述: Not enough support from bra liner
评论详情: Let me start by saying this tank top is made of quality material. You won’t have to layer it with another tank to prevent it from being transparent. The colors won’t bleed or fade in the laundry which leads me to believe this tank will last longer than some of my others. It’s got a decent amount of stretch to it which I like when the weather is hot. My only complaint is that the built in bra lacks the support it needs to keep my girls where they should be. I would consider the built in bra more of a VERY light liner with some triangle pads. The pads in the liner also slide around in the liner so I didn’t feel like I got the coverage I needed. I kept falling out the bottom of the bra/liner so I eventually put on a regular sports bra underneath this tank in order to get the support I required. For reference, I wear a 36DD or 38D bra and I ordered a XL in this tank. I think if I went with a large the bra/liner might have been better, but still not enough to exercise intensely without some kind of added support.

The color is fantastic and the fit is great. The fabric is soft and the built in bra is rather supportive. I am a size 8, 5’5” and 155lbs. I wear a 36C/D bra and the medium works great. It is a longer length top and is overall flattering. I’d definitely order again.

评论概述: Very nice yoga top, on the long side
评论详情: This is a very nice yoga top, has a built in bra, with a really nice print. Fabric is a very nice quality and has excellent stretch.  Fits well and is true to size although I think it runs very long.  I definitely don’t want my top riding up during yoga but this one seems excessively long, even with me being short. But I will be wearing this top frequently to my yoga and Pilates classes, long or not because I like it that much!

This shirt is really soft and comfortable. I purchased a L size and it fit exactly as I hoped. The color is really pretty as well, I got pink. These shirts are perfect for everyday wear or workouts. Overall I like the shirt and will be getting more soon.

评论概述: Runs a bit big, love the length and the cute pattern.
评论详情: I am 5'7" and 155lbs with a 30" waist.  I normally wear between and M and a L and based on other reviews that said this ran big, I ordered a size M.  It fits perfectly!The outer shirt is made of a medium weight swimsuit like athletic material and there is a shelf bra with pads you can leave in or remove.  The pads are a bit thicker and more structured than typical removable pads and I have found that when I wash this they stay in place better than other bra tops I have with removable pads.The print on this shirt is super cute and vibrant.  I love the length here as well.  I can wear this out and cover my butt or I an tuck it in an pull it out a bit.  Very nice and versatile length.  The support this top provides for me is medium to light; I wear it boxing, walking, and weightlifting, but probably wouldn't wear it running or cycling.The top is soft and comfy.  All of my other bra tops are very formfitting and I love that this one is a more relaxed fit while still being supportive.  I love wearing bra tops in the summer so I don't need to have a separate bra on and I am looking forward to leaving the MN winter behind so I can actually wear this around outside some in a few months!I think this is an amazing top for the price and would buy it in other patterns if they had some other ones.  Recommended!  The sizing chart is accurate so make sure to go by that and not your normal size.
Soft , great built in shelf bra, no wire , true to size
The fabric is very comfortable and I love the longer cut. The built in bra is great as long as you aren’t expecting it to offer support.  It fits as expected. I would order your normal size.

I got this tank top for my daughter who is in college. She likes it a lot. She says it is comfortable. She doesn't like form fitting workout clothes so this was perfect for her. The quality seems good. Might just need a little more bust support.

评论概述: Got This For My Wife. She Said Tank You!
评论详情: My wife, the official tester and user says (because if I wear it it's such a drag) ...  Nice and soft fabric, with a little stretch. Really like the fun floral print design. Like the builtin bra, although not that much support for exercise.  Four stars.

This top is so comfortable the material is very soft to the touch.  The bra portion is extremely comfortable, the elastic is wide and it gives you a nice gentle lift.  It's like a nice comforting squeeze when you put it on. And I swear it helps with posture by pulling your shoulders back.  I really like that it is a longer tunic like length as well. Order your normal size, fit is great.

Really soft and fits well!
Love the feel of this fabric - ordered a second shirt in black!

评论概述: Soft fabric, runs slightly larger than stated size.
